price: 45. Waxaanse abuurnay Facyo (is xigsada Muuse kaddib) waxaana ku dheeraaday cumrigii14. Adiguna ma aheyn mid dhex joogay reer Madyan, adigoo u akhrinaya Aayadahayaga. Annaga baase ku soo dirnay (Rusuul ahaan )15.
arabic: وَلَٰكِنَّآ أَنشَأۡنَا قُرُونٗا فَتَطَاوَلَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡعُمُرُۚ وَمَا كُنتَ ثَاوِيٗا فِيٓ أَهۡلِ مَدۡيَنَ تَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا وَلَٰكِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ
footnotes:
14. Markaasay hilmaameen oo dayaceen amarradii Alle.
 15. Nabigu s.c.w. ma heysto dariiq kale uu ku ogaado wararkan aan ahayn Waxyiga Alle u soo waxyooday.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walākinnā anshanā qurūnan fataṭāwala ʿalayhimu al-ʿumuru wamā kunta thāwiyan fī ahli madyana tatlū ʿalayhim āyātinā walākinnā kunnā mur'silīna
